trans-unit.source: The exception that is thrown when an incoming security token fails Audience URI validation.
trans-unit.target: 当传入的安全令牌的受众 URI 验证失败时引发的异常。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Tokens.AudienceUriValidationFailedException"></xref> class.
Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Tokens.AudienceUriValidationFailedException"></xref> class using the specified error message.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新实例<xref href="System.IdentityModel.Tokens.AudienceUriValidationFailedException"></xref>类使用指定的错误消息。

trans-unit.source: A message that identifies the reason the exception occurred.
trans-unit.target: 一个标识异常的原因发生消息。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Tokens.AudienceUriValidationFailedException"></xref> class using the specified XML serialization data and contextual data about the source and destination of the serialization stream.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新实例<xref href="System.IdentityModel.Tokens.AudienceUriValidationFailedException"></xref>类使用指定的 XML 序列化数据和有关源和目标的序列化流的上下文数据。

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Runtime.Serialization.SerializationInfo"></xref> that contains values that are used during serialization and deserialization.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Runtime.Serialization.SerializationInfo"> </xref> ，它包含在序列化和反序列化期间使用的值。

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SecurityTokenValidationException"></xref> that contains data about the source and destination of the serialization stream.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SecurityTokenValidationException"> </xref>包含有关源和目标的序列化流的数据。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SecurityTokenException"></xref> class using the specified error message and root cause of the error.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新实例<xref href="System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SecurityTokenException"></xref>类使用错误的指定的错误消息和根本原因。

trans-unit.source: A message that identifies the reason the exception occurred.
trans-unit.target: 一个标识异常的原因发生消息。

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Exception> that represents the root cause of the exception.
